attributes.action: Give nhs staff a decent pay rise. Stop treating them with such contempt.
attributes.additional_details: Were not responsible for the debt you've got us in. Were not responsible for covid 19. Were just the people who you and the country looked to to save them.
attributes.background: Sort it out. Show your appreciation from the nation.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
